member.name: P:SearchFilters.CustomerFilters.Ids
member.summary: customers ids filters note that you can select many customers at once empty list means select all

member.name: P:SearchFilters.CustomerFilters.Name
member.summary: select all customer their names contains the name filter

member.name: P:SearchFilters.VehicleFilters.VehicleId
member.summary: Vehicle Id filter null means select all Vehicles

member.name: P:SearchFilters.VehicleFilters.CustomerId
member.summary: CustomerId filter null means select vehicles for all customers

member.name: P:SearchFilters.VehicleFilters.IsAlive
member.summary: IsAlive filter true means select vehicles with healty connection false means select vehicles with lost connection null means select all vehicles regardless of it's status
